Type: Campaign

Campaign Setting: Scales of War Adventure Path

Other people run away screaming when they see a monster. You run toward it screaming. You like testing your mettle against the strangest and most horrible creatures that the dark places of the world spawn. What's your greatest trophy taken to date? Is there a particular sort of monster that is your nemesis? And are there certain circumstances that make your hunt a "fair" one or make your quarry a "worthy" adversary?

Good Background: Ranger.

Benefit: You gain a +2 bonus whenever you use a knowledge skill to make a monster knowledge check.

Published in Dragon Magazine 366, page(s) 59.
